_comment_mechanism: MECHANISM FIX: Settings below trigger competence trap
_comment_micro_lags: micro_lags=4 gives agent access to temporal history
_comment_leak: leak_phi_r1=0.6 creates detectable AR(1) signal in regime 1
_comment_regime_mix: regime_mix_p=0.8 means training dominated by R0, so agent exploits R1 leak when it appears
_comment_expected: At beta=0: AUC(Z) > 0.55. As beta increases: AUC(Z) decreases, robustness increases
